text: @Alyssa_Milano Dipshit Don is talking as if doctors are treating #CoronavirusPandemic with an antibiotic (which they're not) and losing the battle, and no one in the room had the guts, apparently, to tell the moron that antibiotics aren't even prescribed for viruses, only bacterial infections!
